text: Melissa Rivers (born Melissa Warburg Rosenberg; January 20, 1968) is an American television co-host for fashion and red carpet interviews on cable and satellite television. She is a former host of the E! cable network. She also worked for a TV Guide channel with her mother, comedian Joan Rivers. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American television presenters Category:Television personalities from New York City
title: Melissa Rivers
